statements: SELECT * FROM movement_data;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, x_coordinate, y_coordinate, z_coordinate FROM movement_data;
SELECT * FROM movement_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM movement_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, x_coordinate, y_coordinate FROM movement_data WHERE z_coordinate < 0;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, x_coordinate, y_coordinate, z_coordinate FROM movement_data WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM movement_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01' ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT user_id, x_coordinate, y_coordinate, z_coordinate FROM movement_data WHERE x_coordinate > 0 AND y_coordinate < 0 AND z_coordinate = 0 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT user_id, timestamp, z_coordinate FROM movement_data WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY z_coordinate DESC, timestamp ASC
SELECT user_id, timestamp, x_coordinate FROM movement_data ORDER BY user_id DESC, timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM movements WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT position_x, position_y FROM movements WHERE position_z > 0;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, position_x FROM movements WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-02-01';
SELECT user_id, AVG(position_x), AVG(position_y) FROM movements GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT behavior_type, SUM(duration) FROM user_behavior GROUP BY behavior_type;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, position_x, position_y, position_z FROM movements WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, timestamp, position_x, position_y, position_z, behavior_type, duration FROM movements m JOIN user_behavior b ON m.user_id = b.user_id ORDER BY b.duration DESC, m.timestamp ASC
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM movements WHERE position_x > 0 AND position_y < 0
SELECT user_id, behavior_id, behavior_type FROM user_behavior WHERE behavior_type IN ('walk', 'run', 'jump') ORDER BY behavior_id ASC
SELECT user_id, AVG(position_x), AVG(position_y), AVG(position_z) FROM movements GROUP BY user_id
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT movement_id, user_id, movement_type FROM movements WHERE movement_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY movement_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(score) AS total_score FROM user_scores GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_score > 100;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE registration_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_email FROM users ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT movement_id, user_id, movement_type FROM movements WHERE movement_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT user_id, AVG(score) AS average_score FROM user_scores GROUP BY user_id HAVING AVG(score) > 80;
SELECT user_id, username, age, gender FROM user_info;
SELECT session_id, start_time, end_time, session_duration FROM session_info WHERE completed = TRUE;
SELECT position_x, position_y, position_z, timestamp FROM user_tracking ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, age, gender FROM user_info WHERE age > 25;
SELECT simulation_id, platform_version, simulation_date, completed FROM simulation_data WHERE simulation_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, session_id, timestamp FROM user_tracking WHERE position_x > 0.0 AND position_y < 100.0 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, age, gender FROM user_info WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT session_id, start_time, end_time, session_duration FROM session_info WHERE completed = true AND start_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY session_duration DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT simulation_id, platform_version, simulation_date FROM simulation_data WHERE completed = false ORDER BY simulation_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM user_tracking ut JOIN user_info ui ON ut.user_id = ui.user_id WHERE ui.gender = 'Male' AND ut.position_z < 50.0 ORDER BY ut.timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT registration_date, last_login_date FROM user_accounts WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, session_id, movement_type FROM user_movements ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_sessions WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND end_time <= '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, registration_date FROM user_accounts WHERE last_login_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT session_id, start_time, end_time, duration FROM user_sessions ORDER BY start_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, timestamp FROM user_interaction WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, analysis_type, result FROM user_analysis WHERE result LIKE '%success%' AND analysis_type IN ('report', 'summary');
